title: What is Medium?
content: Anyone can write on Medium. Thought-leaders, journalists, experts, and individuals with unique perspectives share their thinking here. You’ll find pieces by independent writers from around the globe, stories we feature and leading authors, and smart takes on our own suite of blogs and publications. A blank page is also a door. At Medium you can walk through it. It's easy and free to share your thinking on any topic, connect with an audience, express yourself with a range of publishing tools, and even earn money for your work. Become a Medium member to enjoy unlimited access and directly support the writers you read most. Enjoy unlimited access to every story across all of your devices. Your membership helps us pay writers, and keeps your experience ad-free. Download our app so you can read wherever you are. Visit our company blog for the latest news, product updates, and tips and tricks. Our team is home to engineers, journalists, artists, and creatives of all stripes.
